description:
An old phone rings and voice on the other end is asking for help.  Tagiru and Yuu go to check it out and run into the ghost hunter Kaoru.  Is the disturbance caused by a Digimon or something from the other side?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Thrilling Horror Experience! The Spirit Hunter`s Shout!!
Dokidoki Kyoufu Taiken! Shinrei Hunter ga Hoeru!!
ドキドキ恐怖体験! 心霊ハンターが吠える!!
